outputs.output_descr: The project is  designed to become a collaborative, partnership-based project that will engage oil and gas companies and the local communities in a shared vision to conserve the region's biodiversity and promote sustainable development in the Niger-Delta region.

project_descr: Mainstream biodiversity development priorities into O&G Sector policies and operations using the governance framework of law, policy, and institutional capacity and also the Niger Delta Biodiversity Trust as a development mechanism for local communities.
